sobercards.quote: Live and let live.
Keep recovery first to make it your last.
Don/'t let people rent space in your head.
Nothing changes if nothing changes.
We either make ourselves miserable or make ourselves stronger, the amount of work is the same.
Faith without works is dead.
KISS: Keep It Simple Stupid.
To thine own self be true.
Before you say I can/'t, say I/'ll try.
Trying to pray is praying.
Some things are true whether you believe them or not
One hour at a time, one day at a time, one step at a time.
It gets real, it gets different, it gets real different.
One day at a time.
Keep coming back. It works if you work it.
Don/'t quit before the miracle happens.
We are only as sick as our secrets.
Willingness is the key.
Serenity isn/'t freedom from the storm. It/'s peace within the storm.
Love and tolerance is our code.
Easy does it.
Don/'t be bitter, be better.
Remember, it/'s progress not perfection.
One drink is too many and a thousand is not enough.
Stick with the winners.
If I could drink like other people I would drink all the time.
idle hands are the devil/'s playground.
First things first.
More will be revealed.
This too shall pass.
Do the next right thing.
Peace and serenity through surrender.
Don/'t borrow trouble from tomorrow.
Don/'t take everything so personally.
Play the tape out.
Instead of saying I have to; say, /'I get to./'
Rule#62: Don/'t take yourself too damn seriously.
Sometimes quickly, sometimes slowly.
What is the loving and giving action I can do, right here and now in this situation.
Just don/'t drink.
When one door closes, another one opens.
God is never late.
Thy will not mine, be done.
Stay sober for yourself.
Resting on our laurels, we are in trouble if we do.
If you/'re feeling guilty, you probably are.
Start missing meetings and you start missing drinks.
Character is how we act when no one is watching.
Sobriety is a journey, not a destination.
Be part of the solution, not the problem.
Let go and let God.
Live in the now, look for the now, accept the good.
